meanings.definition: The mast nearest the bow on a ship.
meanings.sent1: The foremast stood tall at the front of the ship.
meanings.sent2: Sailors climbed the foremast to adjust the sails.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous seagull perched on the foremast, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: The foremast cut through the mist like a beacon of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The foremast swayed gently with the rhythm of the waves.

meanings.definition: The forward mast of a sailing vessel.
meanings.sent1: The captain gazed proudly at the foremast as they sailed into the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The crew hoisted the flag on the foremast for all to see.
meanings.sent3: The foremast seemed to wink at the crew as if sharing a secret.
meanings.sent4: The foremast reached towards the sky like a silent sentinel.
meanings.sent5: The foremast guided the ship through the stormy seas with unwavering strength.
